Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, the New York Dream Act, which would grant certain benefits to eligible undocumented immigrants.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation establishing the New York DREAM fund commission, which will advance the educational opportunities of children of immigrants through scholarship programs for higher education.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing the New York DREAM fund commission.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Immigration
Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, the New York Dream Act, which would grant certain benefits to eligible undocumented immigrants.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Legislature to pass and the Governor to sign legislation establishing the New York DREAM fund commission, which will advance the educational opportunities of children of immigrants through scholarship programs for higher education.

Items.MatterName: Establishing the New York DREAM fund commission.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Barron and Speaker Quinn
